CommandDefinition.Name: setxmomodsname
CommandDefinition.Description: Redefine the ODS storable name corresponding to a XMOM storable or its extensions.

Argument.Name: fqDatatypeName
Argument.Description: The fullqualified name of the datatype

Argument.Name: path
Argument.Description: The path to the column or table. Format of path is a dot-seperated list of variable names

Argument.Name: fqPath
Argument.Description: The fullqualified path to the column or table. Format of path is a dot-seperated list of variable names followed by their type in curly braces, e.g.: baseTypeVar{bg.odsmap.extensionType}.myVar

Argument.Name: odsName
Argument.Description: Unique database name for the specified datatype or variable
